content.text:
# List of presidents of Biafra

-->
| footnotes =
}}
The president of Biafra was the head of state of the Republic of Biafra, a secessionist state that consisted of the old Eastern Region of Nigeria.
List of presidents
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;"
|-
! rowspan=2|
! rowspan=2| Portrait
! rowspan=2| Name
! colspan=3| Term of office
! colspan=2 rowspan=2| Political party
! rowspan=2| Notes
! rowspan=2|
|-
! Took office
! Left office
! Time in office
|-
| 1
|
| C. Odumegwu Ojukwu
| 30 May 1967
| 8 January 1970
|
! style="background:;"|
| Military
| Fled to Ivory Coast at the end of the Nigerian Civil War.
|
|-
| 2
|
| Philip Effiong
| 8 January 1970
| 15 January 1970
|
! style="background:;"|
| Military
| Surrendered Biafra to Nigeria.
|
|}
